Smart Toothbrush with App: A toothbrush that connects to a mobile app to provide personalized brushing instructions, track progress, and provide feedback on technique. The app could also use machine learning to recommend the best toothpaste and floss for the user's specific needs.

Toothbrush with Built-in Water Reservoir: A toothbrush with a built-in water reservoir that automatically dispenses water onto the bristles during brushing, reducing the need for manual refills and making the brushing experience more convenient.

Toothbrush with UV Sanitization: A toothbrush with a built-in UV light that sanitizes the bristles after each use, killing any bacteria that may have accumulated during brushing. This would provide an extra layer of protection against oral health issues.

Toothbrush with Interchangeable Heads: A toothbrush with interchangeable heads that can be easily swapped out to accommodate different brushing needs, such as sensitive teeth, gum care, or deep cleaning.

Toothbrush with Biodegradable Materials: A toothbrush made entirely of biodegradable materials, such as bamboo or corn starch, that can be composted after use, reducing waste and promoting eco-friendly habits.
